text: Corniglia () is a frazione (part) of Vernazza, Italy. It is in the Province of La Spezia, in the region of Liguria, Northern Italy. It is part of the Cinque Terre, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Among the five villages in the Cinque Terre, Corniglia is the only one that does not touch the sea. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Cinque Terre Category:Settlements in La Spezia
title: Corniglia
